entry.title: Ringtong - Spring Bloom Darjeeling Black Tea First Flush 2025
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea Co. (P) Ltd.
Type: Black Tea
Price: 2.08 - 80.40 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Mostly greenish leaves with just a few silver tips
Tea Colour:
Light golden
Tea Infusion:
Greenish & coppery leaves with a soft & pleasant nose.
Fine new season Spring Tea from the Ringtong estate in Darjeeling. This well-made tea has a mouthful of aroma, that is mildly floral and with a soft and sweetish finish that leaves a fine taste in the palate.

entry.title: Green Queen Organic Nilgiri Tea First Flush 2025
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Green Tea
Price: 2.52 - 97.63 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Light green longish open leaves & buds.
Tea Colour:
Light yellow
Tea Infusion:
Bright green leaves & buds with mild vegetal nose.
A very fine Organic Green Tea from the Blue Mountains of South India. Expertly and selectively made, this handcrafted offering has very subtle & soft floral notes with a pleasing aroma. The finish is very gentle and smooth A profound, refined and ethereal health beverage - the like of which is very difficult to find.

entry.title: Turzum - Spring Enigma Darjeeling Black Tea First Flush 2025
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 8.27 - 319.98 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Well-rolled darkish leaves with few green open leaves and silver tips.
Tea Colour:
Very Pale Yellow
Tea Infusion:
Green leaves with mild coppery hues and a soft floral nose.
New season 2025 spring tea from the well-known Turzum estate in Darjeeling. This is very fine tea from the delayed early harvest of the estate and comes with noteworthy features that are fairly unique. The flavour profile of this small lot of tea consists of a very soft and floral aroma and pleasant fruitiness. The mellowness makes for a wonderful drinking pleasure.

entry.title: Spring Moonlight Mystique Darjeeling Black Tea First Flush 2025
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: Black Tea
Price: 12.64 - 488.99 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Well-rolled dark green leaves & silver tips with several open green leaves.
Tea Colour:
Very Pale Golden
Tea Infusion:
Mostly light green leaves with few coppery corners and a prominent nose.
Selectively harvested 2024 Spring Moonlight tea from the renowned & scenic Thurbo estate in Darjeeling. This rare plucking has a soft, sweet and a very pleasant taste. Extremely mellow, delightfully floral and amazingly smooth - these are characteristics of this tea which sets it apart from most others this season

Dry Leaf:

Tea Colour:

Tea Infusion:

New season 2025 organic prime spring tea from the Okayti estate in Darjeeling. Mildly sweetish, fruity and flavoury - this is a choice tea that can be relished by itself or with light savouries.

entry.title: Spring Ruby Organic Darjeeling Black Tea First Flush 2025
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 4.22 - 163.27 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Rolled longish dark leaves with few open green leaves and some silver tips.
Tea Colour:
Light Yellow
Tea Infusion:
Coppery leaves & buds with greenish hues and a fragrant nose.
Darjeeling prime Spring Flush Tea from the Organic and well-known Arya estate. This season-fresh tea is a fine example of mellowness and mild sweetness with a rounded fruity flavour that tickles the palate. The wafting floral aroma and a very soothing aftertaste, makes drinking this a great pleasure to indulge in, this season.

New season 2025 spring tea from the Giddapahar estate in Darjeeling. This tea has characters that bring forth fruitiness, a pleasant flavour and soothing floral elements. A fine varietal to brew and relish, few times a day.

entry.title: Mountain Mist Magnus Kangra Black Tea First Flush 2025
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: Black Tea
Price: 2.86 - 110.76 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Well-rolled longish dark green wiry leaves with few open green leaves & silver tips..
Tea Colour:
Pale Green
Tea Infusion:
Green leaves & buds with a soft nose.
New season 2025 Spring Tea from the picturesque Kangra region of Himachal Pradesh in north-western India. This first plucking tea, harvested under the shadows of the mighty Dhauladhar range, commands characteristics which are found only for a short period of time during Spring, thereafter which the quality begins to deteriorate. This unusal tea has a mild & subtle flavour with soft vegetal notes. The added fruitiness makes this a one of its kind and by far the season's best tea from the region.

entry.title: Spring Waft Terai Black Tea First Flush 2025
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 0.83 - 32.00 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Greenish / greyish rolled leaves with few silver tips
Tea Colour:
Light yellow
Tea Infusion:
Green leaves with coppery corners
Fresh new season 2025 Spring Tea from Terai in the foothills of the Himalayas. This early pick from the area comes with a smooth, slightly floral and mildly vegetal taste that is pleasantly aromatic. The finer soughts from this area are harvested only during this season with a short window.

Dry Leaf:
Grey & green leaves with several silver tips
Tea Colour:
Light Yellow
Tea Infusion:
Mostly bright green leaves with coppery stems
Prime new season Spring Tea from the Giddapahar estate in Darjeeling. This limited-edition offering comes with a delicate smoothness that is defined with fruitiness, clonal notes & floral aroma and makes for a memorable drinking experience.

entry.title: White Pride Organic Darjeeling White Tea First Flush 2025
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: White Tea
Price: 31.78 - 1229.86 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Bold, Downy Silver Buds With Very Few Dark Light Green Leaves
Tea Colour:
Pale yellow
Tea Infusion:
Bright Green Buds & Leaves With just a nominal Presence Of Coppery Notes With a Soft Nose.
New Season 2025 Exotic Spring Flush White Tea From The Renowned And Organic Badamtam Estate In Darjeeling. This Limited-Edition And Most Sought-After Tea Has Been Very Selectively Plucked From Special Bushes And Minimally Processed To Maximise The Retention Of The Flavour & Bouquet. This Is A Very Exclusive Offering That Is Extremely Mellowed, Subtle, Soft, Fragrant And Having A Very Delicate And Mild Floral Aroma With A Soft & Sweetish Finish. Exceptional And Possibly The Best Offering Of The Season.

New season 2025 very early harvest fine Spring Teas from the highly reputed Organic Arya tea estate in Darjeeling. This flowery offering has a very fruity flavour with mild sweetness with smooth floral notes which unite to make for an aromatic and exceptional cuppa to relish this season.

2025 early Spring Tea from the higher reaches of the Hillton estate in Darjeeling, known to make some fine teas during this season. This particular small lot comes with unmatched smoothness, mellowed floral aroma with a soft fruity flavour and makes for an excellent cuppa. A fine tea at an attractive price.
